resources.string: Click on the marker to view IATA code!
The cheapest deal is indicated in red

Thank you for using BesTime.
 This app is intended for users to pick the best date to schedule their trip plan. It will search recently purchased tickets from Travelpayouts partners and let users to compare the daily cheapest prices of the desired route within the same month.

 First, use the IATA SEARCH button to find the unique three letters assigned to the nearby airports for your origin and destination.

 Then, use the TICKET SEARCH button to find the cheapest price of the day within your desired month. Users can save and update their possible traveling date if any price is available for the date.

 Meanwhile, use SAVED TICKETS button to view their previously saved button to compare or delete any record. To assist record comparing, the cheapest price is indicated in red color.
